backend/main.mo: Defines canister types and state for reviews, articles, bikes, comments, ratings, and brand data with access control and storage mixins, plus admin seeding logic for popular bikes.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI components, and pages.
frontend/.deploy-retry-trigger: Marker file indicating a retry deployment attempt triggered due to a previous generic deployment error.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation outlining steps for retrying deployments, validating success, and handling repeated failures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, defines all app routes, and wraps the app in ThemeProvider with toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component providing about info, category links, regions, social icons, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Navigation header with logo, category links, region selector, search, auth button, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps the app with region context and renders header, footer, routed content, and a profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with async handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/BikeCard.tsx: Displays a bike preview card with image, region badge, specs, price range, and navigation to bike details.
frontend/src/components/BikeForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing bikes including images, pricing, region, color options, brand logo, and markdown-based spec parsing.
frontend/src/components/BikeImageGallery: Image gallery with main image, navigation arrows, thumbnails, error fallback, and optional expand handling.
frontend/src/components/BikeSelector.tsx: Popover-based searchable selector for choosing a bike from a list.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Grid of category cards linking to category pages or comparisons with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays a comments section for a review with creation, deletion, and moderation actions, handling loading states and authentication.
Renders a side‑by‑side comparison of two bikes with specs and optional review scores, highlighting differences.
frontend/src/components/ImageLightbox.ts: Provides a modal lightbox for browsing images with keyboard and button navigation and error fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/LatestLaunchesCa: Shows recent launch articles in a looping carousel with titles, regions, excerpts, and navigation controls.
Renders long-form text, sanitizing HTML or converting markdown-style headings into styled prose components.
frontend/src/components/MobileToc.tsx: Displays a collapsible mobile table of contents that highlights the active heading and supports navigation.
frontend/src/components/ModerationMenu.t: Provides a dropdown menu for admins or comment owners to hide or delete comments with a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/PaletteSwatchEdi: Dialog for editing a hex color swatch with validation and live preview.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Forces new authenticated users to enter name and optional bio before continuing.
frontend/src/components/RatingWidget.tsx: Displays average review rating and allows authenticated users to submit star ratings.
frontend/src/components/RegionFilter.tsx: Tabs component for selecting a region filter including an 'all' option.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuthActio: Wrapper that prompts unauthenticated users to sign in before performing an action.
frontend/src/components/RichTextEditor.t: Custom rich text editor supporting images, captions, formatting, and paste sanitization.
frontend/src/components/ScoreBreakdown.t: Shows detailed score categories with progress bars and an overall rating badge.
Renders a navigable list of page headings with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button to toggle between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refreshing on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current user's auth status, profile, and role based on identity and backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state using Dfinity's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating articles, reviews, and related content via an actor API with success/error UI handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionContext.tsx: Implements a React context for storing and updating the selected region, persisted in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useTableOfContents.ts: Extracts page headings and tracks the active section using IntersectionObserver, exposing scroll-to-heading functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables, theming, global styles, and content‑editable image and caption styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstrap file that mounts the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Renders an article detail view with TOC integration, loading states, metadata display, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/BikeDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific bike, including images, colors, price, and validation for invalid or missing IDs. Handles loading states, image lightbox, and navigation back to brands.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Shows all bikes for a selected brand with logo, loading states, and navigation back to the brands list. Filters bikes by brand and renders them in a grid.
frontend/src/pages/BrandsPage.tsx: Lists all motorcycle brands with search, logo aggregation, and bike counts. Generates a brand grid linking to brand detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/BuyingGuideDetailPage: Renders a specific buying guide with table of contents, metadata, quick checklist, and full article content. Handles loading and missing-guide states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Displays articles or reviews for a selected category with region filtering and loading states. Sorts and shows content cards with region and score indicators.
frontend/src/pages/ComparePage.tsx: Allows users to select two bikes and compare them using a comparison table. Includes bike selectors, validation, and conditional rendering of comparison results.
frontend/src/pages/CreateArticlePage.tsx: Provides a form for authenticated users to create or save articles with fields for metadata and content, then navigates to the article or drafts list after submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreateReviewPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to create or save motorcycle reviews with ratings, bike selection, pros/cons, and content, then redirects to the review or drafts list.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage sections including hero, latest launches, trending reviews, and category navigation using fetched articles, bikes, and reviews.
frontend/src/pages/ManageBikesPage.tsx: Enables authenticated users to create, edit, delete, and seed bike listings, showing a list of their bikes with admin seeding support.
frontend/src/pages/MyDraftsPage.tsx: Shows a user's draft articles and reviews with options to publish or navigate to create new content, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed review page with bike info, scoring, long-form content, and table of contents, loading data from review and bike queries.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Fetches articles, reviews, and bikes, then filters them by a search query to display grouped search results and matching brands.
frontend/src/pages/SectionPalettesPage.t: Provides a UI to create text-based sections that generate and edit color palettes derived from text or user-added hex codes.
frontend/src/tiptap/extensions/ImageWith: Empty or placeholder file for a Tiptap extension handling images with captions.
frontend/src/utils/markdownSpecs.ts: Parses Markdown spec tables to extract formatted specs text plus optional price ranges and color lists with robust parsing helpers.
frontend/src/utils/reviewFields.ts: Utility functions converting review pros/cons between textarea and arrays and normalizing rating values to a 0–100 range.
frontend/src/utils/richTextHtmlSanitizer: Sanitizes rich text HTML by restricting tags, attributes, classes, and styles to a safe allowlist for secure rendering.
frontend/src/utils/sectionPalette.ts: Provides functions to detect hex and named colors in text and generate variant-based color palettes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, focusing on implementing and enhancing Tiptap image support and related editor features.
